title: Sample Book, 1939
medium:
Medium: silk, rayon, paper, celluoid
Technique: printed and woven
dimensions: H x W x D: 40.7 x 33 x 3.3 cm (16 in. x 13 in. x 1 5/16 in.)
description: Sample book with dark blue celluloid cover, celluloid ring binding and letters on the front cover: Ducharne. Contains 206 samples. Printed samples include: 32 silk crinkle crepes, 57 flat silk crepes, 15 silk chiffons, 12 linen-finished silks, 5 rayon novelties, 3 rayon satins, and 5 shantung-finished rayons. Woven samples include: 47 silk novelties, 2 silk and rayon stripes, and 28 silk and rayon novelties.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sample Book, 1939.
1939. Medium: silk, rayon, paper, celluoid
Technique: printed and woven. Gift of William Hardy, Inc.. 1939-61-6.
